sense.def:
An overture
je glasbeno delo, ki je uvod k operi ali gledališki igri.

To make overtures to someone
pomeni s svojim vedenjem nekomu pokazati, da želimo postati njegov prijatelj ali da si želimo ljubezenske zveze z njim.

seg.quote: Mrs Thorne had made overtures of friendship.
He feared they would reject his overtures.
